name: maull-script-enhanced
description: Enhanced Complete VPS Tunneling Solution with Full Automation, Advanced User Management, and Multi-Protocol Support

scripts.preview: node -e "const http = require('http'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { const filePath = req.url === '/' ? 'preview.html' : req.url.slice(1); const extname = path.extname(filePath); let contentType = 'text/html'; if (extname === '.css') contentType = 'text/css'; else if (extname === '.js') contentType = 'text/javascript'; fs.readFile(filePath, (err, content) => { if (err) { res.writeHead(404); res.end('File not found'); } else { res.writeHead(200, { 'Content-Type': contentType }); res.end(content); } }); }); server.listen(8080, '0.0.0.0', () => console.log('Server running at http://localhost:8080')); "
scripts.test: echo "Testing Maull-Script V1.2.0..." && bash -n maull-script.sh && bash -n install-tunneling.sh && echo "âœ… All scripts passed syntax check"
scripts.docs: echo "ðŸ“š Documentation available:" && echo "â€¢ README.md - Main documentation" && echo "â€¢ ADVANCED-FEATURES.md - Advanced features guide" && echo "â€¢ TROUBLESHOOTING-GUIDE.md - Troubleshooting guide" && echo "â€¢ GITHUB-SETUP.md - GitHub setup guide"
scripts.validate: echo "ðŸ” Validating configuration files..." && find . -name '*.json' -exec jq . {} \; && echo "âœ… All JSON files are valid"
scripts.clean: echo "ðŸ§¹ Cleaning temporary files..." && rm -rf temp/ tmp/ *.log *.backup
scripts.deploy: echo "ðŸš€ Deploying Maull-Script V1.2.0..." && chmod +x *.sh && echo "Ready for deployment!"
scripts.monitor: echo "ðŸ“Š System monitoring commands:" && echo "â€¢ htop - Process monitor" && echo "â€¢ iftop - Network monitor" && echo "â€¢ vnstat - Bandwidth statistics" && echo "â€¢ systemctl status - Service status"
scripts.backup: echo "ðŸ’¾ Creating backup..." && tar -czf maull-script-backup-$(date +%Y%m%d).tar.gz *.sh *.md *.json *.html && echo "âœ… Backup created"
scripts.security-check: echo "ðŸ”’ Security check commands:" && echo "â€¢ fail2ban-client status - Check fail2ban" && echo "â€¢ ufw status - Check firewall" && echo "â€¢ ss -tuln - Check open ports" && echo "â€¢ last - Check login history"

author: Maull-Script Team
